title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist
author: Mohammad Rahmani
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/priority": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/priority", "created": "20191128091704103", "modified": "20191128091705248", "type": "application/json", "text": "{ "20191128091704101": "none" }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/state": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/state", "created": "20191128091701794", "modified": "20191128091705229", "type": "application/json", "text": "{ "itemtext": "" }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/status": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/status", "created": "20191128091704103", "modified": "20191128091705265", "type": "application/json", "text": "{ "20191128091704101": "undone" }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/tasks": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/sidebar/tasks", "created": "20191128091704103", "modified": "20191128091705218", "type": "application/json", "text": "{ "20191128091704101": "23" }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/history": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/history", "created": "20190715180723489", "modified": "20190722044606096", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! 1.0.0 -- final release <<< ; 22th July 2019 * New categories added: `share`, `tip`, `horn` * Show/hide item creation timestamp * Min width of ui is 320px to fit the small screen of cell phones * Minor issues fixed <<< !! 1.0.0 -- release candidate 6 <<< ; 19th July 2019 * [NEW] Priority button cycles through five levels of priority and use colors for levels * [NEW] New minimal interface * [NEW] New internal tiddlers explorer lets you to delete individual todo list * [NEW] Documentation exmple shows to create multiple todo list in a single tiddler * [Fixed] priority macros does not insert symbols any more <<< !! 1.0.0 -- release candidate 6 <<< ; 18th July 2019 * Enter key in bulk edit mode terminates edit mode and returns to view mode * Escape key now cancels the adding new task and clears the input textbox <<< !! 1.0.0 -- release candidate 4 <<< ; 17th July 2019 * Customizable shortcutkey for adding new item! by default `Enter` is added * All states were condensed into `stateTiddler`. For each state a key/value is used <<< !! 1.0.0 -- release candidate 2 <<< ; 16th July 2019 * Revert to TW 5.1.19 to support more audiences * redesign the main UI ** no table is used in UI ** flexbox layout for main UI and archive display * supports multi todo lists in the same wiki * supports UI width to have custom layout (media query was removed) * Merge done/undone all button <<< !! 1.0.0 -- release candidate <<< ; 15th July 2019 * Upgraded to TW 5.1.20pre, so it wont work on TW5.1.19 * redesign the Todolist UI * Uses the new checkbox parameters in TW 5.1.20 for uncheckactions * added media query to increase the ui width to 100% of tiddler width * add mark all items as done * add mark all items as undone * archive completed (done) items * show archive items <<< !! 0.7.0 -- bug fixes. <<< * [FIXED] data tiddler are now included in plugin * [FIXED] textbox placeholder message was modified <<< !! 0.5.0 -- first public release" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/archive.svg": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/archive.svg", "created": "20190716095419117", "modified": "20190719134051390", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bug.svg": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bug.svg", "created": "20190714051837328", "modified": "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/list-alt.svg": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/list-alt.svg", "created": "20190716095433587", "modified": "20190719134051385", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/share-alt": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/share-alt", "caption": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/internals": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/internals", "created": "20190716171918410", "modified": "20190721054445159", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Explore internal tiddlers <<< Todolist plugin uses some internal data tiddlers to create and manage todo list. Each todolist uses several data tiddlers. It is recommended after deleting a todolist, delete all data tiddlers which are not in use. <<< <>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/license", "created": "20190715180723490", "modified": "20190719134051377", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Distributed under an MIT license. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. <<< " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/add-task": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/add-task", "created": "20190715170540482", "modified": "20190722041935188", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-input-task() <$keyboard key="escape" actions=<> > <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<> > <$edit-text tiddler=<> index="itemtext" tag="input" class="kk-todolist-input-textbox" placeholder="add new item" default="" minHeight="1em" focus="yes" /> \end \define todolist-add-task() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Add new item"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <> \end \define todolist-add-task-action() <$set name=item value=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex[itemtext]] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="undone" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="none" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="itemtext" $value=""/> \end \define todolist-cancel-action() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="itemtext" $value=""/> \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/archive-operations": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/archive-operations", "created": "20190719141644069", "modified": "20190722042453162", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-list-archived-items(nameSpace:"") <$vars archiveTiddler="""$nameSpace$/archive""" priorityTiddler="""$nameSpace$/priority""" > <$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item">
<>
<>
<$view tiddler=<> field="title" format="date" template="mmm 0DD, YYYY 0hh:0mm"/> <$transclude tiddler=<> index=<>/>
\end \define todolist-show-priority-level() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Prority of archived items cannot be changed"> <$macrocall $name="disp-priority-badge" color={{{[getindex]}}} /> \end \define todolist-delete-item() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define todolist-empty-archived-tiddler(nameSpace) <$vars archiveTiddler="""$nameSpace$/archive""" priorityTiddler="""$nameSpace$/priority""" > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete archive <$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/bulk-operation": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/bulk-operation", "created": "20190716083959795", "modified": "20190722044210602", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-mark-all-button() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="markall" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Mark all items as done" setTitle=<> setIndex="markall" setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <<__todolist-done-all>> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="markall" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Mark all items as undone" setTitle=<> setIndex="markall" setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} <<__todolist-undone-all>> \end \define __todolist-done-all() <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="done" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define __todolist-undone-all() <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="undone" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define todolist-archive-completed-items() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Archive done items"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/archive.svg}} <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="markall" $value="no"/> \end \define todolist-display-archived-items() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Display archived items"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/list-alt.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/archive-list" title=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="td-namespace" $value=<> /> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="yes"/> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/category": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/category", "created": "20190714040123984", "modified": "20190721150818263", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define high(text) $text$ \end \define normal(text) $text$ \end \define low(text) $text$ \end \define fixme(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/wrench.svg}} $text$ \end \define bug(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bug.svg}} $text$ \end \define horn(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bullhorn}} $text$ \end \define tip(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/lightbulb}} $text$ \end \define share(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/share-alt}} $text$ \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/confirm-delete": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/confirm-delete", "created": "20190721041511697", "modified": "20190721044220015", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-confirm-delete( btnLabel:"Delete these tiddlers", confirmMessage:"Are you sure you wish to delete", stateTiddler:"", countFilter:"", actionMacro:"") <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive" popup=<> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} $btnLabel$ <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter=<<__countFilter__>> />"""> $confirmMessage$ <> tiddler(s)?
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive" actions=<<__actionMacro__>> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete all?
\end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/delete-task": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/delete-task", "created": "20190715170610146", "modified": "20190719134051449", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-delete-task(dataTiddler) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<__dataTiddler__>> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/done-task": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/done-task", "created": "20190715170633034", "modified": "20190719134051447", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-done-task() <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="done" unchecked="undone" default="undone" actions=<<__done-actions>> > \end \define __done-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explore-internalTids": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explore-internalTids", "created": "20190719143452217", "modified": "20190721054605890", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-fullbaseName() $(td-data-prefix)$$(baseName)$ \define todolist-explore-data-tiddlers() <$set name=td-data-prefix value="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/"> >Number of internal tiddlers found: <$count filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/]]" />
><$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-all-tids" filter=<> />

Todo lists

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]removeprefixremovesuffix[/state]sort[]]" variable="baseName"> <$set name=bsFilter value="[prefixsort[]]">

<> <>

<$list filter=<> variable="internalTid" emptyMessage="//No internal data tiddlers is found!//">
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-single-iternalTid" />
<$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/>
\end \define todolist-delete-single-iternalTid() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define todolist-delete-all-tids-baseName() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Delete all data tiddlers in this Todo list?"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> \end \define todolist-delete-all-tids() <$macrocall $name="todolist-confirm-delete" btnLabel="Delete all interal tiddlers?" stateTiddler="temp" countFilter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/]]" actionMacro=<> /> \end \define action-empty-archive() <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/]]" /> \end \define todolist-dataTiddlers() {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/internals}} \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/options": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/options", "created": "20190716075847899", "modified": "20190722035027460", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-options-button() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="option" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show options" setTitle=<> setIndex="option" setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="option" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide options" setTitle=<> setIndex="option" setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} \end \define todolist-options-content() <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="option" text="yes"> <> <> <> <> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priority": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priority", "created": "20190718170817837", "modified": "20190721144441462", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-set-priority() <$macrocall $name="todolist-cycle-color" stateTiddler=<> stateIndex=<> /> \end \define disp-priority-badge(color) \end \define todolist-cycle-color(arraySet:"crimson magenta gold limegreen mediumblue none", stateTiddler:"", stateIndex:"txt") <$vars array=<<__arraySet__>> currentColor={{{[<__stateTiddler__>getindex<__stateIndex__>]}}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Set priority level"> <$macrocall $name="disp-priority-badge" color=<> /> <$set filter='[enlistafter]' name=NextItem emptyValue={{{[enlistfirst[]]}}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<__stateTiddler__>> $index=<<__stateIndex__>> $value=<> /> \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/show-task": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/show-task", "created": "20190715170652239", "modified": "20190722041301374", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-show-task() <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<<__kbd-action>> > <$list filter="[getindex[editview]] +[search[edit]]" emptyMessage="""<$macrocall $name="view-task" dataTiddler=<> />""" > <$edit-text tiddler=<> index=<> tag=input class="kk-todolist-input-textbox" /> \end \define __kbd-action() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="editview" $value="view" /> \end \define view-task(dataTiddler) <$transclude tiddler=<<__dataTiddler__>> index=<>/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="timestamp" text="show"> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" format="date" template="mmm 0DD, YYYY 0hh:0mm"/> \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-edit-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-edit-button", "created": "20190715171733677", "modified": "20190719134051440", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-toggle-edit-button() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="editview" text="edit"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex="editview" setTo="edit" tooltip="Edit items"> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="editview" text="edit"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex="editview" setTo="view" tooltip="Save items"> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-timestamp": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-timestamp", "created": "20190722034557852", "modified": "20190722035119990", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-toggle-timestamp() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="timestamp" text="show"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex="timestamp" setTo="show" tooltip="Show timestamp"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="timestamp" text="show"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex="timestamp" setTo="hide" tooltip="Hide timestamp"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-off}} \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/ui": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/ui", "created": "20190715170739310", "modified": "20190722034028989", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-ui(caption:"A plain todo list", width:"100%" base:"base") <$vars nameSpace="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$" stateTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/state" taskTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/tasks" doneTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/done" statusTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/status" priorityTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/priority" archiveTiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/data/$base$/archive" displayArchivedTiddler="todolist - Archived Items - $base$" >
$caption$
<>
<>
<>
<>
<> <$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item">
<>
<>
<>
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-task" dataTiddler=<>/>
<$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item">
<>
<$macrocall $name="view-task" dataTiddler=<> />
<>
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-task" dataTiddler=<>/>
\end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/undone-task": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/undone-task", "created": "20190715190405259", "modified": "20190719134051436", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todolist-undone-task() <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="done" unchecked="undone" default="undone" uncheckactions=<<__undone-actions>> > \end \define __undone-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/mechanism": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/mechanism", "created": "20190716161142919", "modified": "20190722051246465", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "This tiddler explains how Todolist plugin works ! Mechanism <<< Todolist plugin uses three data tiddlers (json tiddler) to store the todo items. Each todo item is an entry in data tiddler as below * a todo item is stored in task tiddler * a done item is stored in done tiddler * the status of item (done/undone) is stored in status tiddler !!! ''User interface'' The user interface including * A todolist title (e.g caption) * Add new item * Oprion panel ** check/uncheck all ** archive completed (done) items ** display archied items ** show/hide item created timestamp * A block displays items one by one with control buttons ** done/undone button ** item description ** item timestamp (if visible) ** item priority ** delete button !!! ''Priority'' There is five priority levels. Very high, high, normal, low, very low. The item priority can selected by clicking on the dedicated priority button. By every click the item priority changes and cycles through preset levels. !!! ''Categories'' Each category has a dedicated macro. To create a category the related macro should be called. Other categories can be simply added by adding desired macros. <<<" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/readme", "created": "20190715180723492", "modified": "20190722134542759", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": " !! How to use <<< Todolist is a Pure tiny Tiddlywiki pluging for creating simple todolist. In any tiddler you wish to have the Todolist simply call `todolist-ui` macro. Details are given below. <<< !! Syntax <<< ``` <> ``` !! Content and parameters |Parameter |Type |Description |h |caption |optional|a short description appeares at top of todolist. The default value is `A plain todo list` | |width |optional|the width of UI, default value is `100%`. All CSS units are valid to be used e.g `60%`, `400px`, `15em`, etc. A min-width as `320px` was set, means UI width can not be smaller than this.| |base |optional|a name space used for creating different todolist. It is actually used in naming the data tiddlers internally used for todo lists. The default value is `base`. | <<< !! Add, edit items <<< !!! Add a new item * Simply click in the provided textbox and give the description of new item * Then click on the add button {{$:/core/images/new-button}} * Or simply press `Enter` key. This is a keyboard shotcut and can be customized via [[Keyboard Shortcut Tab|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]]. Find `add-to-item` entry and add your shortcut key of choice. It is assumed `Enter` is set. !!! Edit an item # Click on the edit button {{$:/core/images/edit-button}}, this will enable inplace editing of all items # Goto the desired item and edit it # Finally click on done button {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <<< !! Done, undone, and delete items <<< !!! Change an item status to done * To change an item status to //done//, go the desired row in todolist and click the checkbox at the left side. !!! Change an item status to undone * To change an item status to //undone//, go the desired row in todolist and remove the checkmark by clicking the checkbox. !!! Delete an item * To delete an item, go the desired row in todolist and click on {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} at the right side <<< !! Priority <<< Todolist supports task priorities. In RC 7 five colors are used e.g red, magenta, yellow, green, and blue for //very high//, //high//, //medium//, //low//, and //very low// priority. The circle with no colors means no priority! <$list filter="crimson magenta gold limegreen mediumblue none" variable="color"><$macrocall $name=disp-priority-badge color=<> /> When a new item is added to todo list, a grey circle appears right of the task row. No color means no priority. Clicking on this small icon, cycles through colors and you can choose the right color for priority this item has. These are similar to categories. <<< !! Categories <<< Todolist has several categories and support user categories. The below categories are available ; Primary categories :<> :<> :<> ; Secondary categories :<> :<> :<> :<> :<> The colors used are pale colors for minimum contrast with normal text. !!! How to use categories A category is a simple macro. To use a category use the related macro. Each category macro has a syntax like below: ``` <> ``` For example to create an item with high priority add new item with the below description (text in textbox) ``` <> ``` The current version of Todolist has eight category macros: `high`, `normal`, `low`, `fixme`, `bug`, `tip`, `horn`, and `share`. <<< !! Bulk operations <<< * Click on the {{$:/core/images/options-button}} a slider will show more options panel !!! Done/undone all items * You can done/undone all items at once by clicking on below buttons * {{$:/core/images/save-button}} to mark all items as done * {{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} to mark all items as undone !!! Archive complete items * You can also export done items to archive using {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/archive.svg}} button * You can navigate to archive and see them as a table !!! Display and manupulate completed items * By clicking on {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/list-alt.svg}} you can navigate and display archived items * In Archive item tiddler, you can remove all items at once or selectively remove those you like. !!! Display the timestamp * By clicking on {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} you can show/hide the date item created * Normally there is no need to display the data, but sometimes it is useful to display when the item was created <<< ! Install <<< Simply drag and drop $:/plugins/kookma/todolist into your wiki <<< ! Project code and demo <<< * [[GitHub demo page|https://github.com/kookma/TW-Todolist]] * [[GitHub code page|https://github.com/kookma/TW-Todolist]] <<<" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/main.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/main.css", "created": "20190716040116074", "modified": "20190721145119641", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css", "text": "/* Todolist main ui */ .kk-todolist-ui{ min-width:320px; /* controls the minimum width of whole ui */ } .kk-todolist-ui svg{ fill:#aaaaaa; } .kk-todolist-ui button:hover svg { fill: #888888; } /* Todolist header ui */ .kk-todolist-header-ui{ display: flex; width: 100%; } .kk-todolist-header-ui > div{ margin: 2px; flex-grow:0; } .kk-todolist-header-ui .kk-todolist-header-textbox{ flex-grow:1; } /* Todolist items ui */ .kk-todolist-row{ display: flex; width: 100%; /* for larg screen width> 960px*/ flex-wrap: wrap; } .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-done, .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-priority, .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-delete { flex-grow:0; width:15px; } .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-desc{ flex-grow:1; width: calc(100% - 50px); padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; } .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-delete { opacity: 0.3; } .kk-todolist-row .kk-todolist-priority{ margin-right:5px; } .kk-todolist-row:hover { background-color: #f6f6f6; } .kk-todolist-row:hover .kk-todolist-delete { opacity: 1; }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/other.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/other.css", "created": "20190715171940902", "modified": "20190722052612232", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css", "text": "/* completed item */ .kk-todolist-item-done { text-decoration: red line-through; font-style: italic; } /* inputbox for add-task */ .kk-todolist-input-textbox { width:100%; padding-left: 5px; border: none; border-bottom: 1px dotted grey; } .kk-todolist-input-textbox:focus { outline: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #5778d8; background: transparent; } /* item timestamp */ .kk-todolist-date { font-size:0.8em; color:#c0c0c0; } /* Item categories */ .kk-todolist-category-c1, .kk-todolist-category-c2 { padding-right:3px; } .kk-todolist-category-c1 svg, .kk-todolist-category-c2 svg { opacity:0.70; vertical-align: middle; width: 1em; height: 1em; } .kk-todolist-category-c1 svg{ fill:#8B0000; } .kk-todolist-category-c2 svg{ fill:#006400; }" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/archive-list": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/archive-list", "created": "20190716084402662", "modified": "20190719142111397", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Archive of completed (done) items <$macrocall $name="todolist-empty-archived-tiddler" nameSpace={{!!td-namespace}} /> > <$macrocall $name="todolist-list-archived-items" nameSpace={{!!td-namespace}} /> " } } }
